XenotypeDef.label: chyrr
XenotypeDef.description: Chyrr are blind, flying mystics native to steaming jungles and sun-blasted deserts. They perceive the world through sound and low-level psychic sensing, aided by a hazy thread of precognition that lets them act just before things happen. Though physically fragile, they defend themselves with a keening cry that can leave foes reeling.
